targets.expr: sum by(instance, node, pod_cidr, system_uuid) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__range]))
max by(instance, node) (max_over_time(kube_node_created{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__range])) * 1000
max by(instance, node) (last_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="pods"}[$__range]))

max by(node, internal_ip) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)

min by(node) (
  (max_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{location="$location", node=~"$node", condition="NetworkUnavailable", status="true"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 2
  or
  (max_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{location="$location", node=~"$node", condition="MemoryPressure", status="true"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 3
  or
  (max_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{location="$location", node=~"$node", condition="DiskPressure", status="true"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 4
  or
  (max_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{location="$location", node=~"$node", condition="PIDPressure", status="true"}[$__interval]) == 1) * 5
  or
  (20 + min_over_time(kube_node_status_condition{location="$location", node=~"$node", condition="Ready", status="true"}[$__interval]))
)

max by(node, os_image) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)

max by(node, kubelet_version) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)

max by(node, kernel_version) (last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
or on()
(
  vector(0) unless on() last_over_time(kube_node_info{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)
max by(node) (last_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__range]))
max by(node) (last_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__range]))
avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__interval]))
avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__interval]))

+ avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__interval]))
- avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__interval]))

+ avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__interval]))
- avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__interval]))

panels.description: can briefly dip below zero, but average mut be positive

targets.expr:
sum by(node) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{location="$location", node=~"$node", mode!~"idle|iowait|steal"}[$__rate_interval]))
-
sum by(node) (avg_over_time(node_namespace:container_cpu_usage_seconds:irate{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: cpu: usage: node - pod (delta)

targets.expr:
(
  # sum by(node) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{location="$location", node=~"$node", mode!~"idle|iowait|steal"}[$__rate_interval]))
  sum by(node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", node=~"$node", id="/", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))
  -
  # sum by(node) (avg_over_time(node_namespace:container_cpu_usage_seconds:irate{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
  sum by(node) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/kubepods.slice|/kubepods", cpu="total"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
/ sum by(node) (avg_over_time(kubelet_active_pods{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]) != 0)

(
  sum by(node) (
    + avg_over_time(node_memory_Active_anon_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    + avg_over_time(node_memory_Inactive_anon_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    # + avg_over_time(node_memory_KernelStack_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    # + avg_over_time(node_memory_PageTables_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    # + avg_over_time(node_memory_VmallocUsed_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Slab_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  )
  - sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/"}[$__interval]))
)

(
  + sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice"}[$__interval]))
  - sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/kubelet.service"}[$__interval]))
  - sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/containerd.service"}[$__interval]))
  
  # + sum by(node) (
  #   + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice"}[$__interval])
  #   - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice"}[$__interval])
  # )
  # - sum by(node) (
  #   + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/kubelet.service"}[$__interval])
  #   - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/kubelet.service"}[$__interval])
  # )
  # - sum by(node) (
  #   + avg_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/containerd.service"}[$__interval])
  #   - avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/containerd.service"}[$__interval])
  # )
)

sum by(node) (
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_AnonPages_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_Active_anon_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_Inactive_anon_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_AnonHugePages_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Cached_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Buffers_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Active_file_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Inactive_file_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_KernelStack_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_PageTables_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_VmallocUsed_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_Slab_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_SUnreclaim_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_Unevictable_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  + avg_over_time(node_memory_Percpu_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Shmem_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  # + avg_over_time(node_memory_Mapped_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
)
-
sum by(node) (avg_over_time(node_namespace:container_memory_rss_kernel{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))

(
  + sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/kubelet.service"}[$__interval]))
  + sum by(node) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{location="$location", node=~"$node", id=~"/system.slice/containerd.service"}[$__interval]))
  - 80 * 1024 * 1024
)
/ sum by(node) (avg_over_time(kubelet_active_pods{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]) != 0)

(
  sum by(node) (
    avg_over_time(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    -
    avg_over_time(node_memory_MemFree_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    -
    avg_over_time(node_memory_Buffers_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
    -
    avg_over_time(node_memory_Cached_bytes{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval])
  )
  -
  sum by(node) (avg_over_time(node_namespace:container_memory_rss_kernel{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
)
/
(
  (
    max by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_capacity{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__range]))
    -
    avg by(node) (avg_over_time(kube_node_status_allocatable{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="memory"}[$__interval]))
  ) != 0
)
sum by(node) (avg_over_time(kubelet_active_pods{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))
sum by(node) (max_over_time(ephemeral_storage_pod_usage{location="$location", node=~"$node"}[$__interval]))

sum by(node) (avg_over_time(node_namespace:kube_pod_container_resource_requests{location="$location", node=~"$node", resource="cpu"}[$__interval]))
